description: Devil May Cry 3 originally released in 2005 is the hit sequel to Devil May Cry 2. Featuring all new weapons, fights and the newly added style mechanic.

v0.4.0.description:
- Different difficulties can now be automatically unlocked
- Added a minimum rank and difficulty for mission clear checks
- Added SS Rank checks (By default these are excluded locations)
- Mission order randomization
- Goal can be modified to require all missions be completed in any order

APWorld Specific:
- DeathLink tag is now enabled automatically if enabled in YAML
- Gun and Weapon skill level randomization are now separate options
- Minor fixes for M14 and SM2
v0.4.0.title: Devil May Cry 3 0.4.0
